headline: Evacuated Americans Wait in Limbo on California Military Base
abstract: The 195 Americans who flew from China to California were first told they must clear medical tests that could take 72 hours or many days. Now they are all being quarantined for two weeks.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES â€” This week, a group of strangers came together under a warm Southern California sun. They played ball with their children. They took jogs down tree-lined paths. They watched movies in the afternoon.
